title: Billions Alone/Army of One
description:
This is one of the oneshot that is in the Junji Ito Best of Best: Story Story Collection.

↓ NOTES ↓
Huge thanks to LuCaz for uploading this to Nyaa.si!
Nyaa.si link: https://nyaa.si/view/1272311

The cover art that is being used currently is only temporary since I cannot find the actual cover art for this oneshot, I had to made one myself. If you have a better cover art for this oneshot then please contact me at Discord (Rioki#3797) and also, I couldn't find the exact date for when this oneshot was released, the only thing I know that it was released in the year 2004 but that's about it. So if you do know please contact me on Discord also!
